long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snowcone is a Chrome extension that replaces your new tab page with a lightweight and minimal alternative that respects your privacy. It's currently very early in development.

What it does?
- Search using a variety of search engines (DuckDuckGo, Google, Bing, Qwant)
- Switch between light and dark mode
- Specify a custom background

What it doesn't do?
- Send error and usage logs
- Put your searches through another website
- Run in the background at all times

Planned Features
- Custom bookmarks
- More customization options
